enemies.name: Blood Fungus
enemies.description: Acidic fungal creature that squirts toxic ooze
enemies.tactic1: Move to new target, leave acidic slime trail
enemies.tactic2_5: Squirt toxic ooze to far range (equipment attrition)
enemies.tactic6: Spore cloud engulfing all foes at arm's length (Resist to avoid)

enemies.name: Armor Titan
enemies.description: Massive armored construct with crushing power
enemies.tactic1: Lunge to new target, pinning with Muscle 12
enemies.tactic2_5: Crushing hammer (equipment attrition)
enemies.tactic6: Leap then slam, seismic shockwave (Evade only, basic attrition to all near)

enemies.name: Conjured Dead
enemies.description: Incorporeal undead that phases through walls
enemies.tactic1: Float through walls and doors, appearing elsewhere
enemies.tactic2_5: Touch of Death (freezing necrosis, Evade only, flesh attrition)
enemies.tactic6: Deathly scream (all who hear roll Resist or flee in terror)
enemies.special: Incorporeal - can only be harmed by magic weapons and effects

enemies.name: Cryptopede
enemies.description: Giant insect that scurries on walls and ceilings
enemies.tactic1: Scurry to out-of-reach surfaces, fold into shapes, regenerate D10 HP
enemies.tactic2_5: Pincer Bite (basic attrition, second hit if dropping from above)
enemies.tactic6: Whirling tail barb hits all near foes (basic attrition)

enemies.name: Dragon
enemies.description: Naturally grown dragon with devastating breath weapon
enemies.tactic1: Leap across field (destroy attrition to those in landing area)
enemies.tactic2_5: Claws and Teeth (random foe, basic attrition)
enemies.tactic6: Flame Breath (fills enormous area, brutal attrition; Defense halves damage; burn next round for 1 flesh attrition)

enemies.name: Flame Kin
enemies.description: Living fire creature that teleports through flames
enemies.tactic1: Vanish in smoke, reappear in open flame or from another Flame Kin
enemies.tactic2_5: Burning Touch (flesh attrition, repeats next round unless extinguished)
enemies.tactic6: Flame Wave (ring of fire, same attrition to all foes)

enemies.name: Formian
enemies.description: Skilled dual-wielding warrior
enemies.tactic1: Backstep and brace (ignore 1 attack next)
enemies.tactic2_5: Twin blades slash cross strike (basic attrition)
enemies.tactic6: Split target attack on 2 different targets (basic attrition each)

enemies.name: Frost Lizard
enemies.description: Cold-blooded reptile that freezes its prey
enemies.tactic1: Whip tail, hurry to ice/snow, recover 10 HP
enemies.tactic2_5: Freeze and shatter (equipment attrition)
enemies.tactic6: Deep freeze hiss (equipment attrition, slows movement)

enemies.name: Gargoyle
enemies.description: Stone creature that can petrify victims
enemies.tactic1: Take wing or harden stone skin (+1 DEF each use)
enemies.tactic2_5: Demonic stone claws (basic attrition)
enemies.tactic6: Petrification spell (victim rolls Magic or petrified 1D4 rounds; second petrification is permanent)

enemies.name: Infernal
enemies.description: Fast-moving demon with hellfire powers
enemies.tactic1: Flash blur lunge (cannot be attacked with melee next round)
enemies.tactic2_5: Marrow blades (basic attrition, roll tactics again if 1 on next roll)
enemies.tactic6: Hellfire hex (conjure pentagram, non-infernals suffer basic attrition on touch)

enemies.name: Needler
enemies.description: Deadly archer with piercing arrows
enemies.tactic1: Tumble and hide (if first action, fire bow from cover while hidden)
enemies.tactic2_5: Needle bow (destroy attrition to equipment, then flesh attrition)
enemies.tactic6: Blinding shot (all foes roll Resist or blinded for remainder of round)

enemies.name: Skeleton
enemies.description: Reanimated bones with rusty weapons
enemies.tactic1: Advance forward with shield raised
enemies.tactic2_5: Rusty blade slash (basic attrition)
enemies.tactic6: Skeletal swarm attack (hits all nearby)

enemies.name: Spiderkin
enemies.description: Giant spider that weaves webs. Roll 1D10 and multiply HP/DEF/ATK for size
enemies.tactic1: Skitter to wall, leave sticky web strand (requires Muscle roll or 2+ damage to break)
enemies.tactic2_5: Fang bite (basic attrition)
enemies.tactic6: Abdomen stinger (basic attrition + poison, paralyzes 1D4 rounds on next spider phase)

enemies.name: Slime Beast
enemies.description: Gelatinous creature that engulfs victims
enemies.tactic1: Slurp toward light/movement/open space at plodding speed
enemies.tactic2_5: Slurp forward gaining mass (refills 10 HP, max 100)
enemies.tactic6: Engulf (elongates 1' per 3 HP; creatures sucked in suffer brutal attrition instantly and each round until escaped)

enemies.name: Tunnel Wyrm
enemies.description: Massive burrowing creature
enemies.tactic1: Twist bulk (boulders fall/crush foes unnoticed)
enemies.tactic2_5: Concentric teeth crush (scooped up with rubble; brutal attrition each wyrm phase inside)
enemies.tactic6: Drill (bore into rock; heroes hit by boulders/crushed roll Evade or suffer brutal attrition)

enemies.name: Wraith
enemies.description: Incorporeal spirit that drains life. Can only be harmed by magic, max 1 damage per attack
enemies.tactic1: Move through walls (vanish in solid matter, reappear at lightning speed)
enemies.tactic2_5: Freezing touch (2 flesh attrition, victim stunned for remainder of round; only magic armor allows Defense)
enemies.tactic6: Life-draining touch (D20 roll; if Wraith lower, drains 3D6 hero points from victim; if no hero points, drains skills permanently)
enemies.special: Can only be harmed by magic effects/weapons, max 1 damage per attack

enemies.name: Windmane
enemies.description: Flying creature with frost breath
enemies.tactic1: Take wing/escape to out-of-range (ignore roll of 1 next action)
enemies.tactic2_5: Razor tail slash (basic attrition to all in area)
enemies.tactic6: Frost fire breath (Evade only, 1 flesh + 1 equipment attrition)

enemies.name: Assassin
enemies.description: Deadly killer with zipline gun and smoke bombs
enemies.tactic1: Zipline gun (grapple line, move at incredible speed to out-of-reach location)
enemies.tactic2_5: Deadly dagger (1 basic attrition per point failed on Evade/Defense)
enemies.tactic6: Deadly exit (smoke bomb, scatter razor caltrops; ground movement inflicts 1 basic attrition)

enemies.name: Bog Witch
enemies.description: Swamp sorceress with portal magic
enemies.tactic1: Portal of muck (vanish/emerge, splashed heroes treat witch's DEF as 7 for 1 round)
enemies.tactic2_5: Spell slinger (roll D6 for spell: Wooden Dart/Quicksand/Rot/Regenerate/Fire Spurt/Fog of Death)
enemies.tactic6: A Fine Liar (mimic voices/appearances, roll Resist or distracted 1 round)

enemies.name: Dragon Elder
enemies.description: Ancient dragon with devastating power
enemies.tactic1: Galloping flight (4 legs + wings; those in path roll Evade or suffer basic attrition)
enemies.tactic2_5: Fire and Magic (roll D6 for attack type)
enemies.tactic6: Tail Swipe (sweeps entire scene; Evade for 1 basic, failure = 1 basic + 1 brutal attrition)

enemies.name: Deep Dwarf
enemies.description: Underground dwarf with mining explosives
enemies.tactic1: Brace for impact (+3 to DEF on next attack)
enemies.tactic2_5: Rock hammer (basic attrition)
enemies.tactic6: Mining charge (explosive sulfur, brutal attrition if not in cover, detonates 1D6 phases later)

enemies.name: Demon
enemies.description: Infernal being that can possess victims. Only harmed by cold iron or magical weapons
enemies.tactic1: Teleport (puff of brimstone, prevents with antimagic)
enemies.tactic2_5: Soul Ripper (ebony claws/soul-piercing screams, flesh attrition; if final skill lost = instant heart hit)
enemies.tactic6: Possession (takes control of victim's body; possessed roll 1D4 for behavior: Chaos/Self-Harm/Escape/Feed)
enemies.special: Only harmed by cold iron or magical weapons

enemies.name: Goblin
enemies.description: Small but vicious raiders
enemies.tactic1: Duck and scatter (move to cover, gain +2 DEF)
enemies.tactic2_5: Rusty blade and bite (basic attrition)
enemies.tactic6: Swarm attack (2-4 goblins gang up on one target)

enemies.name: Orc
enemies.description: Brutal warrior with variable stats. Roll D6 for ATK and DEF, D6x10 for HP
enemies.tactic1: Sidestep and evade (+1D4 to ATK on next attack)
enemies.tactic2_5: Ragged axe + spiked shield (basic attrition + stagger, preventing movement next phase)
enemies.tactic6: Battle cry (next ragged axe attack inflicts brutal attrition)

enemies.name: Vampire
enemies.description: Undead bloodsucker. Harmed only by magic/silver/cold iron; sunlight kills in 1D4 rounds
enemies.tactic1: Invisible dash (move anywhere unhindered)
enemies.tactic2_5: Shocking strength (tear limbs, GM discretion on attrition; lost limb = Injured flaw)
enemies.tactic6: Blood drinker's bite (2 flesh attrition, Evade only; if not escaped by next phase, victim dies and reborn as vampire)
enemies.special: Harmed only by magic/silver/cold iron; sunlight kills in 1D4 rounds; wooden stake = 2D12 attack

attritionTypes.description: Victim chooses any 1 skill or equipment to mark off
Victim rolls D10, marks off the indicated skill
Randomly select and cross off 1 equipment
Cross off 1 random skill and destroy 1 random equipment
Mark off 1D6 combined skill and equipment inventory
